body:
Who here owns a product of the Razer company like a keyboard or a mouse or something even more ridiculously overpriced. Recently I have been browsing their website to see what else I can stumble across and found a few interesting things. My question is who has a razer product? Do you guys recommend anything because I know not just me but others may be looking for something a bit better than what they already have. I myself own a Razer Blackwidow keyboard and a Razer Deathadder Chroma mouse. (Didn't realize what keyboard I bought and purchased the basic version not the Chroma version of the keyboard :( ).

Razer Black Widow
Razer Deathadder Chroma

replies.body:
I'll beg to differ.

Razer Mamba TE and Mamba Chroma: Both have a lazer sensor with acceleration and some weird stuff, PASS.

Razer Naga lineup: Overpriced, nuff said. Also has a lazer sensor.

BlackWidow lineup: Kaihl switches. The new BlackWidow X line makes it better, but it's still bad.

Razer Kraken lineup: It's fine, unless you don't want your ears to die.

replies.body:
I'm a fan. I own a blackwidow chroma and a deathadder chroma. Considering I got them for $175 ($134 USD) and $59 ($45 USD) I can say that they were well worth it for the purchased price. They're beautifully designed and I like the matte finish. 

http://www.razerzone.com/au-en/gaming-systems/razer-blade-stealth as soon as this guy drops in Australia and as long as it isn't anything more then the US sale price - I think it'll definitely be my next laptop (AND I WAS AN AVID MAC USER D:)
